info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Fairfield and east central Putnam Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brewster, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danbury, Sherman, Brewster, Newtown, Ridgefield, Bethel, Brookfield, New Fairfield, Putnam Lake, Brewster Hill and Peach Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
